translations: v．咬，大口嚼：用力地咬或大口地嚼食物。

sentences.sentence: He chomped his way through two hot dogs.
sentences.translation: 他呼哧呼哧地吃掉了两个热狗。

sentences.sentence: I chomped hungrily through the large steak.
sentences.translation: 我狼吞虎咽地吃着那一大块牛排。

sentences.sentence: No one wants to be grossed out seeing food being chewed up or hearing it being chomped on.
sentences.translation: 不要边吃东西边说话，嘴里有东西时不说话。咀嚼时嘴巴要闭起来。
